alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Galveston and southeastern Chambers Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Galveston Pier 21, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galveston Pier 21, Pelican Island, Gilchrist, Rollover Pass, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Crystal Beach, Bolivar Peninsula, The Strand, Port Bolivar, Moody Gardens and Offatts Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island
